mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.suppliercode AS "suppliercode", a.materialcode AS "materialcode", a.packway AS "packway", a.transport AS "transport", a.freightfee AS "freightfee", a.unitprice AS "unitprice", a.quantity AS "quantity", a.receivedate AS "receivedate", a.totlemoney AS "totlemoney", a.create_by AS "createBy", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy", a.update_date AS "update", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN account_purchase b ON b.id = a.parent_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account_purchase_detail( id, parent_id, suppliercode, materialcode, packway, transport, freightfee, unitprice, quantity, receivedate, totlemoney, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parent.id}, #{suppliercode}, #{materialcode}, #{packway}, #{transport}, #{freightfee}, #{unitprice}, #{quantity}, #{receivedate}, #{totlemoney}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy}, #{update}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE account_purchase_detail SET parent_id = #{parent.id}, suppliercode = #{suppliercode}, materialcode = #{materialcode}, packway = #{packway}, transport = #{transport}, freightfee = #{freightfee}, unitprice = #{unitprice}, quantity = #{quantity}, receivedate = #{receivedate}, totlemoney = #{totlemoney}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_date = #{update}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
